Description: Gold bracelet set with emeralds and pearls strung on gold wire.
Bibliographic references: Jewellery / Catalogue of the Jewellery, Greek, Etruscan, and Roman, in the Departments of Antiquities, British Museum. (2822)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 21 Sep 2013 - 19 Jan 2014 Pearls exhibition at V&A, London 2001 13 Oct-2002 14 Apr, New York, Natural History Museum, Pearls 2002 1 Aug-2003 1 Feb, Chicago, Field Museum, Pearls 2012, 26th March - 17th July, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates, Manarat Al Saadiyat, 'Treasures of the British Museum'
